mapper.select: SELECT /*+ Index_DESC(a regIndex) */ a.*, b.cust_id, b.acc_level FROM eco.cust a INNER JOIN eco.admin b ON (a.memberId = b.cust_Id) WHERE a.admin_yn='Y' OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT count(*) FROM eco.cust a INNER JOIN eco.admin b ON (a.memberId = b.cust_Id) WHERE admin_yn='Y'

SELECT count(*) FROM eco.cust a INNER JOIN eco.company b ON (a.memberId = b.cust_Id) where company_yn='Y'
